thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 19 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Absa Bank Says Its Role Was Limited To Ensuring Compliance Of JSE's Listing Rules By Steinhoff

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Absa Bank Says Its Role Was Limited To Ensuring Compliance Of JSE's Listing Rules By Steinhoff
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - Absa Bank Ltd:
* ABSA BANK STATEMENT ON VEB * NOTED PRESS REPORTS THAT VEB INDICATED IT NOTIFIED ABSA, 2 OTHER BANKS IT IS HOLDING THEM LIABLE FOR LOSSES INCURRED BY STEINHOFF SHAREHOLDERS
* ABSA HAS NOT RECEIVED ANY NOTIFICATION FROM VEB IN THIS REGARD
* ABSA’S MANDATE SPECIFICALLY DID NOT INCLUDE COMPILATION OR REVIEW OF FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OF STEINHOFF SOUTH AFRICA OR ANY OTHER STEINHOFF CO
* ABSA HAS NOT RECEIVED ANY NOTIFICATION FROM VEB REGARDING LOSSES INCURRED BY STEINHOFF SHAREHOLDERS
* ABSA’S ROLE WAS LIMITED TO ENSURING THAT JSE’S LISTING RULES WERE COMPLIED WITH BY STEINHOFF SA, RELEVANT JSE-LISTED COMPANY Further company coverage:
